passives.name: Rock Solid
passives.effects: Every first incoming instance of {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} {{tip|basic damage}} per {{tip|cast instance}} is [[Damage modifier|reduced]] by 15, with a '''maximum''' of 20% reduction each.

effects_structured.raw: Every first incoming instance of {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} {{tip|basic damage}} per {{tip|cast instance}} is [[Damage modifier|reduced]] by 15, with a '''maximum''' of 20% reduction each.
